document.full_text: fortune brands said on friday that it had agreed to sell its golf business to a group led by the owner of the fila sports brand for $1.23 billion.
document.title: business briefing | leisure goods: fortune brands sells its golf line for $1.2 billion
lines_and_colors: fortune brands said on friday that it had agreed to sell its golf business to a group led by the owner of the fila sports brand for $1.23 billion.
